title: Spicy Chickpea Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast chickpeas and sweet potatoes with olive oil, paprika, and salt.
Assemble quinoa, chickpeas, sweet potatoes, and avocado in a bowl.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and serve warm.

title: Mango Coconut Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and honey.
Refrigerate overnight to thicken.
Layer pudding with mango puree.
Top with shredded coconut and serve chilled.

title: Creamy Garlic Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté mushrooms and garlic in olive oil.
Add cream and simmer until slightly thick.
Toss pasta in sauce and sprinkle with parmesan before serving.

title: Mediterranean Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and tomato in olive oil.
Add lentils, cumin, salt, and 4 cups of water.
Cook until lentils are soft and thick.
Serve hot with bread.

title: Berry Oat Smoothie
instructions: Blend oats until fine powder.
Add berries, banana, almond milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Serve chilled in a tall glass.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Mix quinoa, beans, corn, tomatoes, and cumin.
Stuff peppers with the mixture and top with cheese if desired.
Bake for 25–30 minutes until peppers are tender.

title: Zucchini Noodle Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic, ginger, mushrooms, and bell peppers; stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Add zucchini noodles and soy sauce.
Cook for 2–3 minutes until noodles are tender but not soggy.
Serve hot with sesame seeds on top.

title: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion until golden.
Add tomatoes, curry powder, and cumin; cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in chickpeas and coconut milk.
Simmer for 15 minutes until thickened.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
